summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ward Street, from Seventh Avenue North to Warren Avenue; also the public street extending from Ward Street to Taylor Avenue, through Block Fifty-two (52), Mercer's Second Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, together with all necessary wooden curbs, gutters and crosswalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 541 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
